definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Inertia scalars are defined in terms of quantities called inertia vectors.
sentences.chinese: 我们将用惯性矢量来定义惯性标量。

sentences.english: There is only a scalar in memory, and it contains a scalar value.
sentences.chinese: 每个标量都有唯一的值，或者是字符串或者是引用。

sentences.english: Finally, the whole 32bit scalar micro-processor has verified using FPGA prototyping.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对32位标量处理器进行了FPGA验证。

sentences.english: The scalar state may be a good candidate for the ground scalar glueball.
sentences.chinese: 而是基态标量胶球很好的候选者。

sentences.english: Plaintext imbedded into the divisors of a hyperelliptic curve is a key work in HECC.
sentences.chinese: 除子标量乘是超椭圆曲线密码体制中的关键运算。

sentences.english: For a pure scalar potential the zero energy bound state does exist, and the fractional charge does exist.
sentences.chinese: 对于纯标量场，存在零能量束缚态，存在分数电荷。

sentences.english: It was worked out to use two scaler potentials method for calculating magnetic field in aluminium reduction cell.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用双标量位法计算铝电解槽的磁场。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the concept of periodic constant and the process of transforming induction scalar to difference equation.
sentences.chinese: 周期常量是指循环中值呈周期性出现的递归标量。

sentences.english: You can also see which of them are scalar and columnar.
sentences.chinese: 还可查看这其中哪些是标量，哪些是柱状。

sentences.english: Consolidate the values calculated using SIMD into a single scalar return value.
sentences.chinese: 联合SIMD结算的各个结果到一个标量返回值上。

sentences.english: Divisor scalar multiplication is the key operation in hyperelliptic curve cryptosystem.
sentences.chinese: 除子标量乘是超椭圆曲线密码体制中的关键运算。

sentences.english: Scalar-valued functions can be invoked where scalar expressions are used.
sentences.chinese: 可在使用标量表达式的位置调用标量值函数。

sentences.english: Scalar-valued functions can be invoked where scalar expressions are used.
sentences.chinese: 可在使用标量表达式的位置调用标量值函数。

sentences.english: They are sequential collections of scalars, so extra functionality is needed.
sentences.chinese: 它是标量的有序集合，因此需要额外的功能来处理它。
